snippet: Joel I. Klein announces Amplify, the curriculum-cum-tablet from News Corporation; the upfronts season spreads throughout the year; and former White House staffers find new identities on Twitter.
abstract: Joel I. Klein announces Amplify, the curriculum-cum-tablet from News Corporation; the upfronts season spreads throughout the year; and former White House staffers find new identities on Twitter.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: News Corp. Wants a Place in School, and Upfronts Are Not Just for Spring Anymore
